summary: In this context, sulfur dioxide (SO2) is mentioned as one of the air pollutants studied in relation to weekday/weekend variations in ambient concentrations. The reference to Harley pertains to research on the emissions and concentrations of pollutants, including SO2, but there is no direct relationship or interaction discussed between sulfur dioxide and Harley. They are connected through the broader topic of air quality research, but not specifically to each other.
